Question: It has been suggested that this person was probably the last person to know everything there was to be known in his own time.
Hints: Russell also refers to this person's ethics as "repulsive", and calls his logic "as definitely antiquated as Ptolemaic astronomy".
On this ground, feminists have accused this person of misogyny and sexism.
For ****, the soul (psyche) was a simpler concept than it is for us today.
